items.name: Santa Fe Spring Rolls
items.description: Beans and corn and stuff with some cool ranch sour creme dippin' sauwce

items.name: Potato Skins
items.description: More of that ranch sour creme sauwce on potatoes with bacon and cheese

items.name: Monster Nachos
items.description: Just like the ones at Cobb 10 Luxory Theater... you know the ones... yeah.

items.name: Buffalo Wings
items.description: Yeah, these are an appetizer. Stop, It's a meal. Price per wing.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Lady fingers, coffee, and creamy marscapone. Yum

items.name: Baklava
items.description: Flakey layers of pasty soaked in honey and well, basically god nectar

items.name: Sideways Pizza
items.description: Because that's how you have to turn it to fit throught the door. Feeds a small army, or one drunk.
